description: Comprehensive overview of the Universal Protocol Translation System, including semantic mapping architecture, protocol registry system, and high-level data flows
Detailed documentation of the semantic category system, including category definitions, mapping rules, and meaning-based field translation algorithms
Complete specification of the protocol registry system, including semantic hints, trust levels, fallback schemas, and field mapping mechanisms
In-depth documentation of the agent morphing algorithms, including bidirectional translation processes, confidence scoring, and semantic preservation techniques
Comprehensive documentation of data flows between components, including protocol translation paths, semantic preservation mechanisms, and extension field handling
